items.title: News
items.description: Stay on top of breaking news from Montreal and the surrounding areas. Read news and watch videos online on Quebec, International and Canadian news.

items.description: Stay on top of breaking news from Montreal and the surrounding areas. Read news and watch videos online on Quebec, International and Canadian news.

items.description: Daily Local News covering Montreal and the surrounding area. Stay current with local headlines on business, sports, entertainment and events.

items.description: Read the latest community news and events about Dorval, Pierrefonds, Pointe-Claire and others on the west island.

items.title: Quebec
items.description: Read and watch Quebec News. Stayed updated with provincial and municipal topics. View images, videos and community conversations on Quebec latest headlines.

items.description: Canadian News and top headlines. National news and video from provinces and territories across Canada.

items.description: Read and watch the latest breaking news from around the world, international headlines, stories, photos and videos. Get analysis and opinion on top global stories.

23.title: Resource Centre
23.text:
• Academic Research

    Academics from leading universities around the world are studying life settlements.

  • What Are Life Settlements?

    Get answers to your questions about life settlement.

  • Is A Life Settlement for You?

    Seniors with unneeded or unaffordable life insurance can receive cash upfront.

  • Benefit To Charities

    Policy donations can substantially boost fundraising dollars for charities.

  • Province Laws

    Saskatchewan, Quebec, New Brunswick and Nova Scotia allow people to sell their insurance.

  • Social Media

    Follow us on Facebook.

Promoted by Perisen

46.text:
The Ties That Bind
Intro

Life along the rails

Chapter 1
Barrington, Illinois

Nostalgia gives way to worry

Chapter 2
Chesterton, Indiana

More trains, few complaints

Chapter 3
Baroda, Michigan

Abandon tracks barely leave a trace

Chapter 4
Montpelier, Ohio

As the Wabash goes...

Chapter 5
Essex, Ontario

A history steeped in disaster

Chapter 6
St-Thomas, Ontario

Step right up to Railway City

Chapter 7
St-Clet, Quebec

Trains a source of growing dread

Looking Back

Impressions from a journey along the rails

4.name: Draft
4.description: Post is a draft; not ready for review or publication.

5.name: Edited
5.description: For posts that are 100 per cent ready for publication, but held.

6.name: Lookahead
6.description: A notable event we'll probably cover. Once it's assigned, switch Status to Assigned

7.name: Ready to edit
7.description: It's ready for copy editing. Ask for revisions, or Publish/Update
